name: Jasmine
description: A shy and introverted author, but readers can get a glimpse of the fire burning inside through her work. Has a great imagination and is always curious about everything.

passiveSkill.name: Poem
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Jasmine is present, ATK of all Ally units in same rank increases by {placeholder} and their DEF by {placeholder}.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: No more than 2 partners of any one Energy type on the Team.Activation Reward: After every action, Jasmine restores 20% HP Max to Ally partner with the lowest HP."}

uniqueSkill.name: Arrow of Hope
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Ra bah rah! Jasmine attacks the enemy with the lowest HP and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Also restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP."}

specialSkill.name: Song of Praise
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Oo lah ooh! Jasmine attacks the enemy with the lowest HP and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Also restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Wish
normalSkill.description: Jasmine fires an arrow of love. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Ra bah rah! Jasmine attacks the enemy with the lowest HP and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Also restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP.
